Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of bovine bactericidal permeability-increasing protein-derived peptides against gram-negative bacteria isolated from the milk of cows with clinical mastitis.
Literature.Author: Chockalingam A, Zarlenga DS, Bannerman DD
